txt_content:

replies.author: 世予予
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: 逍遥老狗
replies.txt_content:
在哪宣传服务器比较好
入驻哪里比较好

replies.author: sgoye
replies.txt_content: 下载papi变量以及附属扩展就行

replies.author: mcvimik
replies.txt_content:
你需要下载一些变量
放到palceholdapi配置文件的一个expansions的文件夹内

然后再游戏或者后台输入  /papi reload

就可以了

实在不会可以留个联系方式帮你解决

replies.author: 晴天娃娃_
replies.txt_content:
/papi ecloud download vault
/papi ecloud download palyer
/papi ecloud download server
/papi ecloud download javascript
/papi reload

依次输入指令   重启   重进服务器

replies.author: Kavintion
replies.txt_content: 用的是什么计分板插件？

replies.txt_content:

replies.txt_content:
